card.description: Survey of customers in a diner on whether or not they like certain poutine combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of poutine a new customer should order.

mushrooms.description: Does the poutine include mushrooms toppings?

lobster.description: Does the poutine include lobster toppings?

pork.description: Does the poutine include pork toppings?

bacon.description: Does the poutine include bacon toppings?

cheese.description: Does the poutine include cheese toppings?

gravy.description: Does the poutine include gravy toppings?

scallions.description: Does the poutine include scallions toppings?

meat.description: Does the poutine include meat toppings?

bell peppers.description: Does the poutine include bell peppers toppings?

preference.description: Do you like or dislike the poutine?
